basics.name: Andreas Coroiu
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: An engineer at heart who is passionate about software as my craftsmanship - viewing clean code and architecture as an art. I humbly accept that I can never know everything, but still choose to have it as my dream. I love to ask questions, learn, teach, and when needed - speak up. My personal projects often include embedded programming and automation, but curiosity has taken me to other places as well. My main goal and strength is the ability to understand the underlying nature of any problem. Distribution of this type of knowledge and the subsequent creation of a common understanding that it generates is, in my opinion, one of the main keys to success.

work.summary: Worked together with Prisjakt to setup a new department aimed at B2B by coordinating with already existing departments to quickly release to market. All while following the lean startup methodology.
highlights: Microservice based software development in GCP using Python and TypeScript.

work.summary: Remote project working for Volvo, doing architectural design and implementation.
highlights: Full-stack development using ASP.NET Framework, ASP.NET Core and Angular.
Domain discovery and architectural design together with the senior architect.

work.summary: The thesis project "A Platform for Indoor Localisation, Mapping, and Data Collection using an Autonomous Vehicle" explored how an autonomous robot can be used for collecting positional ground truth data while measuring things such as Wi-Fi signal strength.
highlights: Built a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) using the Robot Operating System (ROS).
Created an easy to use web interface for operating the robot.

work.summary: In-house full-stack development using technologies such as Ruby on Rails, Node.js, PHP, AngularJS, with deployement in AWS.

highlights: Web development in Ruby on Rails.
